content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Copper plate mine at position(x=41.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
- Burner mining drill (position x=41.0 y=-82.0) and a stone furnace at position(x=41.0 y=-80.0)
- Burner inserter (position x=39.5 y=-79.5) and a burner inserter at position(x=41.5 y=-78.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(x=60.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position(x=60.0 y=-60.0)

### Power generation structure at position(x=106.5, y=-32.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position x=106.5 y=-32.5), a boiler at position(x=111.5 y=-32.0), and a steam engine at position(x=117.5 y=-30.5)
- Pipe group (position x=107.5 y=-34.5) and pipe group at position(x=105.5 y=-32.5) connecting the offshore pump and boiler

### Transport belt system at position(x=63.5, y=-53.5)
Consists of transport belts at positions (x=63.5 y=-53.5) and (x=64.5 y=-53.5)

# ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using burner entities without fuel
- Ensure that burner entities have fuel before attempting to use them
### Errors when using inserter entities without source items
- Ensure that inserter entities have source items before attempting to use them
### Errors when using furnace entities without ingredients
- Ensure that furnace entities have ingredients before attempting to use them
### Errors when using steam engines without connection
- Ensure that steam engines are connected to a power network before attempting to use them
### Errors when using pipe groups without fluid
- Ensure that pipe groups have fluid before attempting to use them
### Errors when using electricity groups without being plugged into an electric network
- Ensure that electricity groups are plugged into an electric network before attempting to use them

# NAMESPACE
No utility functions have been defined by the agent.
No variables have been assigned.
